title: Device Night Philadelphia: Retail pros go hands-on with the new Surface Pro 4 and Surface Pen
text:
Device Night Philadelphia: Retail pros go hands-on with the new Surface Pro 4 and Surface Pen 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
We get an inside look at Device Night event in Philadelphia and watch retail professionals try out all the features of the new Surface Pro 4...
